member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.ObjectPool.DefaultObjectPool`1
member.summary: Default implementation of .
member.typeparam: The type to pool objects for.
member.remarks: This implementation keeps a cache of retained objects. This means that if objects are returned when the pool has already reached "maximumRetained" objects they will be available to be Garbage Collected.

member.summary: Create a .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.ObjectPool.IPooledObjectPolicy`1.Return(`0)
member.summary: Runs some processing when an object was returned to the pool. Can be used to reset the state of an object and indicate if the object should be returned to the pool.
member.param: The object to return to the pool.
member.returns: if the object should be returned to the pool. if it's not possible/desirable for the pool to keep the object.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.AllowNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that null is allowed as an input even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DisallowNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that null is disallowed as an input even if the corresponding type allows it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that an output may be null even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that an output will not be null even if the corresponding type allows it. Specifies that an input argument was not null when the call returns.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that when a method returns , the parameter may be null even if the corresponding type disallows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter may be null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that when a method returns , the parameter will not be null even if the corresponding type allows it.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the output will be non-null if the named parameter is non-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the associated parameter name.
member.param: The associated parameter name. The output will be non-null if the argument to the parameter specified is non-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute.ParameterName
member.summary: Gets the associated parameter name.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnAttribute
member.summary: Applied to a method that will never return under any circumstance.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method will not return if the associated Boolean parameter is passed the specified value.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified parameter value.
member.param: The condition parameter value. Code after the method will be considered unreachable by diagnostics if the argument to the associated parameter matches this value.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute.ParameterValue
member.summary: Gets the condition parameter value.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have not-null values.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with a field or property member.
member.param: The field or property member that is promised to be not-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the list of field and property members.
member.param: The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have not-null values when returning with the specified return value condition.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and a field or property member.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
The field or property member that is promised to be not-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and list of field and property members.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.ReturnValue
member.summary: Gets the return value condition.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.
